about_the_game:
• Prepare yourself for escalating dangers and ever-increasing challenges as you delve deeper into the unknown.
A mysterious portal has suddenly appeared at your base, threatening to unleash untold horrors if left unchecked. Your primary objective is to keep the portal under control by gathering dark energy to prevent it from opening. As you explore, you'll also need to scavenge old, seemingly useless items to sell for cash, which can then be used to purchase essential gear.



  • Cooperation is key—only by working together can you ensure the survival of your base and the safety of your world.
Why face the dangers alone when you can team up with friends? Back to the Rooms offers a thrilling multiplayer experience where you and your friends can join forces to explore the backrooms levels together. Strategize, share resources, and combine your strengths to tackle increasingly difficult challenges. Working as a team, you’ll be able to secure the vital loot needed to keep the portal under control.



  • Can you gather the resources needed to safeguard your base in these procedurally generated levels and prevent the portal from unleashing chaos? Your home depends on your success.
Your journey begins in the eerie, labyrinthine backrooms, where the real challenge awaits. Each time you enter, the levels are procedurally generated, ensuring that no two experiences are ever the same. To progress, you'll need to find and use keycards to unlock access to new, more dangerous backroom levels. Each new level presents the opportunity to discover rare loot, but also introduces greater risks. The unpredictability of these ever-changing environments will test your wits and survival skills like never before.

name: Back to the Rooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 2050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Back to the Rooms is a 6-player co-op horror experience. Survive and explore the backrooms with your friends or alone to save your home.
